remarks: Function-builder for derivative, quotient rule.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
dvmptdiv.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. { RR , CC } ) $.
dvmptdiv.a $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. X ) -> A e. CC ) $.
dvmptdiv.b $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. X ) -> B e. V ) $.
dvmptdiv.da $e |- ( ph -> ( S _D ( x e. X |-> A ) ) = ( x e. X |-> B ) ) $.
dvmptdiv.c $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. X ) -> C e. ( CC \ { 0 } ) ) $.
dvmptdiv.d $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. X ) -> D e. CC ) $.
dvmptdiv.dc $e |- ( ph -> ( S _D ( x e. X |-> C ) ) = ( x e. X |-> D ) ) $.
dvmptdiv $p |- ( ph -> ( S _D ( x e. X |-> ( A / C ) ) ) = ( x e. X |-> ( ( ( B x. C ) - ( D x. A ) ) / ( C ^ 2 ) ) ) ) $.
$d S x $.
$d V x $.
$d X x $.
$d ph x $.
